item.title: A mixin protocol for seamless interoperability
item.dc:creator: aaryapatil
item.description: Google Summer of Code : OpenAstronomy This summer, I was delighted to have the opportunity to work with the Astropy community, a sub-organisation under the umbrella organisation, OpenAstronomy. The project that I aimed to tackle this summer was originally titled Seamless Combination of SkyCoord, Tab ...READ MORE...

item.title: Gum

item.description: Well, the title of this blog post aptly describes my last month. For the Hindi speakers out there, you fellas understand the pun there, dont you? For those who dont, not to worry. item.title: Jargon, Jargon, sigh

item.description: My much awaited DUE blog post is here fellas (FINALLY). item.title: Google Summer of Code
item.dc:creator: aaryapatil
item.description: I am the kind of person who loves writing. So I would first like to acknowledge the fact that GSOC gave me another medium to do so. Now the purpose of this blog is Google Summer of Code. To talk about my project, my experience with GSOC and fingers crossed, if I do get selected, Continue reading Go ...READ MORE...
